title: Salesforce | AMTS | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech CSE from DTU
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: 2 months internship at Big Tech
Date of the Offer: 2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: Associate Member of Technical Staff
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 18 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4 LPA
Stock bonus: 25000 USD
Bonus: 10% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 
Benefits: 14 days accomodation + 10K reimbursement for travel + 50K relocation bonus, 60K Wellness reimbursement , 15K Dental/Vision Reimbursement

title: Coinbase | IC4 | India
content:
Education: B.Tech CS (TIER 1  college)
Years of Experience: 5 + years
Prior Experience: Google
Date of the Offer: 2024
Company: Coinbase
Title/Level: IC4
Location: Remote

Salary: 54 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 7 LPA
Performance Bonus: 10 % base
Stock bonus: 27 K$ Yearly + refresher yearly
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~93 lpa + refresher every year
Other details: Standard Benefits

In case you ask about my past experience of google and why I switched .  Was forced to switch because of bad wlb and too much silent pip/layoff in G . Apparently they have pip quota in org to fulfill (not official though) .
Too much politics/boot licking nowdays from past 1-1.5 yrs to survive . 
Not worth the effort here . Thanks community for good content here and please upvote .
Hope you all get success and good health
